grow_event_type_esper/3901_1301_0100_10:
My partner Pokémon’s really been growing nicely.
Have a battle with the Pokémon that I’ve filled up
with plenty of love and nutrition!
grow_event_type_esper/3902_1301_0100_10:
The partner Pokémon you’ve got with you sure
gives off a nice aroma! Show me your love for
Pokémon with a battle!
grow_event_type_esper/3903_1301_0100_10:
I’ll leave your head spinning and send you flying!
Come at me with all you’ve got!
